renderGL(int, int) - Method in class dk.nesos.font.Font
Draws the font as one textured quad on the x-axis of the current coordinate system.

ROSY_BROWN - Static variable in class dk.nesos.util.Color

rotateAroundAxis(float, Vector3f) - Method in class dk.nesos.camera.Camera
Rotates the direction around an arbitrary axis (represented by a vector).
rotateX(float) - Method in class dk.nesos.camera.Camera
Rotating the view around the X-axis can be achieved by multiplying the matrix:
[ 1 0 0 ] R_x(t) = [ 0 cos(t) -sin(t) ] [ 0 sin(t) cos(t) ]
with the direction vector.
rotateY(float) - Method in class dk.nesos.camera.Camera
Rotating the view around the Y-axis can be achieved by multiplying the matrix:
[ cos(t) 0 sin(t) ] R_y(t) = [ 0 1 0 ] [ -sin(t) 0 cos(t) ]
with the direction vector.
rotateZ(float) - Method in class dk.nesos.camera.Camera
Rotating the view around the Z-axis can be achieved by multiplying the matrix:
[ cos(t) -sin(t) 0 ] R_z(t) = [ sin(t) cos(t) 0 ] [ 0 0 1 ]
with the direction vector.
